content: GREAT!! I think Israel needs to IGNORE the UN!!! In fact, the UN needs to be DISBANDED completely!!!! They have allowed atrocities to occur all over the world by the muslim terrorists, refusing to do or say ANYTHING to the terror-supporting countries. The atrocities perpetrated by the Islamists are some of the most heinous acts since the ones by the Nazis, yet the UN is SILENT! WHY? EVERY freedom loving country needs to get OUT of the UN and shut down their facilities and STOP the support, but ESPECIALLY the USA!!!
